testcase.name: YouTubeTest
testcase.system-out: Given I initialize chrome driver............................................passed When I go to "https://www.youtube.com/" url.................................passed Then I see home page........................................................passed When I focus Search element.................................................passed When I enter "Tarkan" text to Search text area..............................passed Then I click "ENTER" keyboard button........................................passed Then I click element: Music index: 1........................................passed Then I click element: Explore index: 1......................................passed Then I click element: Home index: 1.........................................passed When I focus Search element.................................................passed When I enter " Kış Güneşi" text to Search text area.........................passed And I wait for 5 seconds....................................................passed
